name: Flip (itch) (Tamsoh)
description:
This prototype is mainly inspired by Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales, where you can move around the level, using your 3 rings, that makes you go at a high speed in the air, with various animations !

Using a gamepad is advised for a better experience.

CONTROLS (also available in game)
  • WASD / ZQSD / Left Stick : Movement
  • Mouse / Right Stick : Camera movement
  • Spacebar / A : Jump (on floor & in the air)
  • Left Shift / RT : Throw ring
  • F / RB : Grapple on edge  
  • Spacebar / A : Quick recovery (when grappling)
  • RMB / Left Stick press : Dive
  • E / LT : Slow Motion
